text: "I Hate Myself for Loving You" is a 1988 song by Joan Jett and is the leading single from their sixth studio album Up Your Alley. It went to number 8 in New Zealand and the United States, number 9 in Paraguay and number 12 in Sweden. == References == Category:1988 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Joan Jett and The Blackhearts songs
title: I Hate Myself for Loving You
